ANIMALS

The water buffalo is a common animal, especially in agricultural regions across Southeast Asia, and can also often be seen in areas like Okinawa’s Sakishima Islands.

more info

The African wild donkey is a species of wild donkey that inhabits the northeastern part of the African continent, particularly in the volcanic landscapes along the East African Rift.

more info

The tiger is a large carnivorous member of the Felidae family and represents the Asian continent's iconic predator.

more info
